price: 53. En (herinner je) dat Wij Moesa de geschriften gaven en het onderscheid (tussen goed en kwaad) zodat jullie rechtgeleid zijn.
arabic: وَإِذۡ ءَاتَيۡنَا مُوسَى ٱلۡكِتَٰبَ وَٱلۡفُرۡقَانَ لَعَلَّكُمۡ تَهۡتَدُونَ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: wa-idh ātaynā mūsā al-kitāba wal-fur'qāna laʿallakum tahtadūna
